name: We Are Terror: The First Days
description: Four chapters, each drawing closer to the great worldwide war between Man and Myth. Each allowing you to experience how the war begins! A reading adventure where you make choices to help the protagonist of each chapter survive, but at the same time, the wrong choices offer their own rewards.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct3D compatible video card with 128MB memory or more DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
